name: withdrawn
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 shy and quiet and preferring to be alone rather than with other people: Following her son's death, she became quiet and withdrawn and rarely went out.

Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a person) preferring to be alone and taking little interest in other people: During the winter, she became depressed and withdrawn.
